segments.text: Hey , don ’ t walk on the lawn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I ’ m looking for my wallet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You lost your wallet ? Anything important in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . A lot of cash . Almost forty thousand pounds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m sorry to hear that . I think you ’ d better talk to the police officer walking there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that is a better way . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
